Package arkivmester

Class ThirdPartiesModel

java.lang.Object
arkivmester.ThirdPartiesModel
public class ThirdPartiesModel
extends java.lang.Object
Contains multiple methods to run different third party tools to test the archive.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Magnus Sustad, Oskar Leander Melle Keogh, Esben Lomholt Bjarnason and Tobias Ellefsen

      Initializes the tempFolder variable with the current tempFolder path.

    • runArkadeTest

      public void runArkadeTest​(java.io.File path, java.util.Properties prop) throws java.io.IOException
      Runs ArkadeCLI through cmd, the output gets printed to the console. Report from the tests gets put in the output folder.
      Parameters:
      path - A file that contains the archive that is to be tested.
      prop - Properties object containing the config.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Cannot run program.

    • runKostVal

      public void runKostVal​(java.lang.String path, java.util.Properties prop) throws java.io.IOException
      Runs Kost-Val through command line, the output gets printed to the console. Report from the test gets moved from the user folder to an output folder.
      Parameters:
      path - A string that contains the path to the archive that is to be tested
      prop - Properties object containing the config.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Cannot run program.

    • runVeraPDF

      public void runVeraPDF​(java.lang.String path, java.util.Properties prop) throws java.io.IOException
      Runs VeraPDF through command line. The report gets put in an output folder.
      Parameters:
      path - A string that contains the path to the archive that is to be tested
      prop - Properties object containing the config.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Cannot run program.

    • runDROID

      public void runDROID​(java.lang.String path, java.util.Properties prop) throws java.io.IOException
      Runs DROID through command line. Creates four different files and places them in a folder.
      Parameters:
      path - A string that contains the path to the archive to be tested.
      prop - Properties object containing the config.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Cannot run program.

    • unzipArchive

      public void unzipArchive​(java.io.File path, java.util.Properties prop) throws java.io.IOException
      Runs 7Zip through command line and unzips the archive.
      Parameters:
      path - A file that contains the archive to be unzipped
      prop - Properties object containing the config.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Cannot run program.

    • runXquery

      public void runXquery​(java.util.Properties prop) throws java.io.IOException
      Runs the selected custom XQueries.
      Parameters:
      prop - Properties object containing the config.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Cannot create/read files.

    • setUpBaseXDatabase

      public void setUpBaseXDatabase​(java.util.Properties prop) throws java.io.IOException
      Sets up a Basex database containing all the archive's .xml files and reports.
      Parameters:
      prop - Properties object containing the config.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Cannot read/create files.

      prop - Properties object containing the config.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Cannot read/create files.

    • runBaseX

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> runBaseX​(java.lang.String xml, java.lang.String xqName, java.util.Properties prop) throws java.io.IOException
      Queries an .xml file via an .xq XQuery/XPath file.
      Parameters:
      xml - Path to .xml file.
      xqName - Config key for .xq file.
      prop - Properties object containing the config.
      Returns:
      String list of the results from the query.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • runCustomBaseX

      public void runCustomBaseX​(java.lang.String xqName, java.util.Properties prop) throws java.io.IOException
      Queries an XQuery file and saves the results in a textfile.
      Parameters:
      xqName - Name of the XQuery file.
      prop - Properties object containing the config.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Cannot read/create files.

    • packToAIP

      public void packToAIP​(java.util.Properties prop, java.lang.String metadataPath) throws java.io.IOException
      Packs the prepared unzipped archive folder to AIP.
      Parameters:
      prop - Properties object containing the config.
      metadataPath - Path to archive's metadata.xml file.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - Cannot create folders or files.

    • checkIfToolsArePresent

      public java.util.List<java.lang.String> checkIfToolsArePresent​(java.util.Properties prop)
      Checks if the third party tools are present where the config defines.
      Parameters:
      prop - Properties object containing the config.
      Returns:
      True if all tools are present, false if there is one or more tools missing.

    • getCustomXqueries

      public java.lang.String[] getCustomXqueries​(java.util.Properties prop)
      Gets the names of the custom XQueries in the custom folder. Also initiates "selectedXqueries" with false for all files.
      Parameters:
      prop - Config property object to get the custom folder's path.
      Returns:
      String array with the name of the custom XQuery files.
